1370: Albertus was born in Den Hof in 1370.
Got married to Yda at age 24 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Yda, Walburgis, at age 24.
1374: Had a son with Yda, Piak, at age 28.
1375: Had a son with Yda, Snelle, at age 29.
1377: Had a son with Yda, Herman, at age 31.
1378: Had a son with Yda, Paradanus, at age 32.
1379: Had a daughter with Yda, Riet, at age 33.
1380: Had a daughter with Yda, Sybillia, at age 34.
1383: Lost daughter Walburgis when Walburgis was 14 years old.
1385: Lost son Piak when Piak was 12 years old.
